itunes:title: #40: Is Shame Controlling You?
title: #40: Is Shame Controlling You?
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, we talk about if your shame is controlling you and if you're reacting outwardly or inwardly. We also dig into whether or not you may be projecting your shame. MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODEThe Recovery School –   FREE DOWNLOAD  CONNECT...
itunes:summary:
In this episode, we talk about if your shame is controlling you and if you're reacting outwardly or inwardly. We also dig into whether or not you may be projecting your shame.
